EmailTemplate.name: British Embassy Newsletter and Lost and Found Items
EmailTemplate.subject: British Embassy News and Lost and Found Lists
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
I have attached an interesting British Embassy Newsletter packed with great information and things to see and do around Moscow!!!
Please check it out and take the time to peruse the list of "Lost and Found Items at the end of this e-mail.
1. Lost & Found
Upper School
Uniform
1. PE shorts, sizes 8, 10, 14
2. Tracksuits, sizes 6, 8
3. Tracksuit pants, sizes 8, 12 (2)
4. Grey jumper, size 18
5. Yellow T-shirt, size 12
6. White shirts, sizes 10 (2), 12 (3)
7. Grey trousers, sizes 10, 12
Non-uniform
Clothes
1. Five pairs of tights
2. Grey trousers
3. White T-shirt
4. Blue shorts
5. Blue fleece jacket
Hats
1. Seven caps (blue, grey, pink, red)
Other
1. Blue USB flash drive
2. USB flash drive (orange wristband)
3. Silver heart-shaped earrings
4. Two water bottles
5. Three lunchboxes
6. Azbuka Vkusa plastic bag with a yellow T-shirt and blue shorts in it
7. Toy hedgehog (brown and grey) in a red dotted scarf
Lower School
Uniform
1. Tracksuits, size 6 (2)
2. PE shorts, size 12
3. Sleeveless jumper, size 6
4. Two pairs of grey trousers, size 6 (2)
Non-uniform
Clothes
1. A pair of jeans, size 6
2. T-shirt
3. Red jacket (98-104)
4. Black jacket
5. A pair of tights
Hats
1. Black hat Adidas
Other
1. Five gloves
2. Scarf
Best Regards
Dino Vikas Head of Admissions The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00
Mob: + 7 (916) 922 04 54
Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
